name: TP Chat Lite
author: Trendy Plugins

sections.description:
Improve your Business with a WhatsApp Chat Button. It allows your Customer to contact you with whatsapp.

Features

More options will be added soon.

  • Add WhatsApp Number
  • Add WhatsApp Default Message
  • Floating Button
  • More options to come etc.
sections.installation:
1. Just log into your WordPress admin dashboard
  2. Visit Dashboard > Sidebar > Plugins > Add New
  3. Search for “TP Chat Lite”
  4. Install and Activate the “TP Chat Lite” plugin
  5. Visit Dashboard > Sidebar > WhatsApp Chat
  6. Add a valid WhatsApp number & default message (Mandatory)
  7. Use & Enjoy!!!
sections.faq:
How can I set WhatsApp number?

You can set WhatsApp number like that +880171740XXX
(with country code but with plus, preceding zero, hyphen, brackets, space)

May you help me?

Sure, feel free to contact us at info@trendyplugins.com

short_description: This plugins helps you to contact with your customer with a WhatsApp floating button. Very easy to use. Support is super active to help you.
